summary: Simply doubles the equipable torch light radius without adjusting the intensity, colour nor duration.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/1wXSO.png[/img][/url][/center]

Steam workshop link: http://steamcommunity.com//sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=8026&searchtext=

Simply doubles the equipable torch light radius without adjusting the intensity, colour nor duration.

If you're using a mod that drastically changes lighting you'll notice that vanilla torches are incredibly weak and hardly suffice as a portable light source. I feel this mod should serve as a pretty good balance between functionality and believability.
author: Emarrel
